# MTLMultisampleStencilResolveFilter.sample0

**Case**

Chooses the first stencil sample in the pixel.

## Declaration

```swift
case sample0
```

## Stencil resolve filters

- **MTLMultisampleStencilResolveFilter.depthResolvedSample**: Chooses the stencil sample corresponding to the depth sample selected by the depth resolve filter.

items.description: Chooses the stencil sample corresponding to the depth sample selected by the depth resolve filter.
items.name: MTLMultisampleStencilResolveFilter.depthResolvedSample
